column4: I'm following a tutorial for installing rails, and I've gotten to a point where it tells me to $ mate Gemfile  but I receive command not found error. Did I miss something along the way?
I'm following a tutorial for installing rails, and I've gotten to a point where it tells me to $ mate Gemfile  but I receive mate: command not found error. Did I miss something along the way?
ok thanks, I wasn't sure if it was a typo or not.
